name: The Legend of
description:
This game was made for ludum dare 47 event. 

The theme is Stuck in a Loop.

You control a character and must defeat all enemies that are spawned in the arena that you are in. If you get killed by someone, you will have the chance to play with the killer. Once you defeat all enemies, you can enter the door in the top side of the arena and start the next round.

You can play using WASD and left click of the mouse.

This game os developed by Rafael Ahrons, Marcos Padilha and Diego "Chokko" Osório.

Hope you have fun playing it!!

We used the following assests:

  • Arrow
  • Gladiator
  • Witcher
  • Archer
  • Fireball
  • Tiles
  • Music
  • Menu Background
